summary: To test screening at U.S. airports, TSA regularly tries to sneak guns and simulated bombs through checkpoints. We testified about TSA’s covert testing efforts, primarily based on our April report . We observed covert tests at 5 airports and reviewed how test results are used. We found that TSA’s ability to run covert tests has improved, but that it could do a better job of...
title: Aviation Security: TSA Has Taken Steps to Conduct More Risk-Informed Covert Tests and Address Vulnerabilities
